translations: n．预言家，卜卦者：古代的预言家，通常通过观察自然现象、解读神秘征兆或进行卜卦等方式预测未来。
· In ancient times, people often consulted soothsayers to predict their future.
在古代，人们经常请教预言家来预测他们的未来。

sentences.sentence: Perhaps soothsayers advised against accepting foreign aid.
sentences.translation: 说不定是算命的建议不接受外国援助的。

sentences.sentence: And I will cut off witchcrafts out of thine hand; and thou shalt have no more soothsayers.
sentences.translation: 又必除掉你手中的邪术。你那里也不再有占卜的。

sentences.sentence: Perhaps soothsayers advised against accepting foreign aid. A cruder suggestion is voiced by a Burmese friend of the author.
sentences.translation: 原译:说不定是算命的建议不接受外国援助的——作者的缅甸朋友提出了一个更简单的猜测。
